text: Tommy J. Walz (born September 22, 1945) is an American politician in the state of Vermont. He is a member of the Vermont House of Representatives, sitting as a Democrat from the Washington-3 district, having been first elected in 2014.https://legislature.vermont.gov/people/single/2018.1/23826 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Vermont House of Representatives Category:Vermont Democrats
title: Tommy Walz
